com.atmecs.falcon.automation.ui.seleniuminterfaces

Interface WindowHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WindowHandlerImpl

    public interface WindowHandler
    Author:
    nv092106 WindowHandler Interface defines services for handling windows, frames and popups

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  WindowHandler.FrameHandler
      FrameHandler interface defines the services for handling frames
      static interface  WindowHandler.PopUpHandler
      PopUpHandle Interface defines the serviecs for handling popups
